heading: HR02369
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSIGHT OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CALL THE NATIONAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION, THE DEPARTMENT OF FINANCE, THE BUREAU OF INTERNAL REVENUE, THE DEPARTMENT OF TRADE AND INDUSTRY, THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT, THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND THE NATIONAL TOBACCO ADMINISTRATION TO CONDUCT A BRIEFING ON THE ILLEGAL MANUFACTURE OF FAKE CIGARETTES
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2019-01-14
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02369
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSIGHT OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CALL THE NATIONAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION, THE DEPARTMENT OF FINANCE, THE BUREAU OF INTERNAL REVENUE, THE DEPARTMENT OF TRADE AND INDUSTRY, THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT, THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND THE NATIONAL TOBACCO ADMINISTRATION TO CONDUCT A BRIEFING ON THE ILLEGAL MANUFACTURE OF FAKE CIGARETTES
